sentence: “He’s taught me how to be a pro whether that’s on the field or off the field.” While Edwards has one more year left on his four-year, $2.8 million rookie deal, fellow starters, right guard Austin Corbett and center Brian Allen, will be unrestricted free agents.

title: NFL Starters Who Could Have Their Jobs Stolen by Free-Agent Signings in 2022

sentence: If the Dolphins were looking to upgrade from Michael Deiter at center, various top options stayed put between Ryan Jensen in Tampa Bay, Ben Jones with the Titans and Brian Allen with the Los Angeles Rams.
